# SKPhysicsWorld

**Class**

The driver of the physics engine in a scene; it exposes the ability for you to configure and query the physics system.

## Declaration

```swift
class SKPhysicsWorld
```

## Overview

`SKPhysicsWorld` runs the physics engine of a scene and is the place that contact detection occurs. Do not create a `SKPhysicsWorld` directly; the system creates a physics world and adds it to the scene’s [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKScene/physicsWorld] property.

The physics world allows you to:

- Set important properties like [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKPhysicsWorld/gravity]
- Join two physics bodies using an [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKPhysicsJoint]
- Respond to collision between two physics bodies using [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKPhysicsWorld/contactDelegate]
- Do custom collisions detection or hit testing

## Configuring the Physics World

- **gravity**: A vector that specifies the gravitational acceleration applied to physics bodies in the physics world.
- **speed**: The rate at which the simulation executes.

## Joining Physics Bodies with Joints

- **add(_:)**: Adds a joint to the physics world.
- **removeAllJoints()**: Removes all joints from the physics world.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes a specific joint from the physics world.

## Detecting Collisions

- **contactDelegate**: A delegate that is called when two physics bodies come in contact with each other.

## Searching the Scene for Physics Bodies

- **Searching the World for Physics Bodies**: Cast a ray to find the physics bodies in the scene that intersect it.
- **body(alongRayStart:end:)**: Searches for the first physics body that intersects a ray.
- **body(at:)**: Searches for the first physics body that contains a point.
- **body(in:)**: Searches for the first physics body that intersects the specified rectangle.
- **enumerateBodies(alongRayStart:end:using:)**: Enumerates all the physics bodies in the scene that intersect a ray.
- **enumerateBodies(at:using:)**: Enumerates all the physics bodies in the scene that contain a point.
- **enumerateBodies(in:using:)**: Enumerates all the physics bodies in the scene that intersect the specified rectangle.

## Sampling Physics Fields

- **sampleFields(at:)**: Samples all of the field nodes in the scene and returns the summation of their forces at that point.

## Physics Simulation

- **Getting Started with Physics**: Simulate gravity, acceleration, collision detection, or joints.
- **SKPhysicsBody**: An object that adds physics simulation to a node.
- **SKPhysicsContact**: A description of the contact between two physics bodies.
- **SKPhysicsContactDelegate**: Methods your app can implement to respond when physics bodies come into contact.
- **SKFieldNode**: A node that applies physics effects to nearby nodes.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
